page.title: 04THE BALLOON FESTIVAL
page.content: Once every year in September a grand balloon festival is held in {ASHTON {COURT'S GROUNDS.}The festival attracts thousands of people over the weekend and hundreds of balloons of many bright colours go up over the city.If you wish to get up very early over the weekend,you may see a magnificent sight of over 50 balloons floating over the city.As well as the balloons there are also charity stalls and advertising.Apart from the traditional shape of the balloons there are also some weird and wonderful designs and shapes like the bottle,pipe and gas flame all advertising different things.
